children.text:
Goodbye 2016 (almost). Hello December 5K! Complete a 5K during the month of December for access to special prices on Top Styles from 2016 in the Runkeeper Store.

Want to expand your wardrobe with a cool new tee or tank? Now’s the time! Our store features a curated selection of the best styles and must haves for all runners. 

Act fast – this offer can only be redeemed until January 7, 2016.
All 5K finishers will receive a link in their completion email to shop special prices on Top Styles from 2016 in the Runkeeper Store.

*Walking, running, and cycling are eligible towards completion.
**GPS and Stopwatch Mode activities are eligible towards completion.
